msIdentifier.repository: Barbara Bates Center for the Study of the History of Nursing

msContents.summary: Chloe Cudsworth Littlefield diaries, 1883-1898, during her years as a private duty nurse in New York and in Springfield, Massachusetts. Chloe Cudsworth Littlefield graduated from Women's Hospital of Philadelphia School of Nursing in 1883.
